description: Elasticsearch Vector Store with with advanced, customizable search capabilities

elasticsearch_url.info: URL for self-managed Elasticsearch deployments (e.g., http://localhost:9200). Do not use with Elastic Cloud deployments, use Elastic Cloud ID instead.

cloud_id.info: Use this for Elastic Cloud deployments. Do not use together with 'Elasticsearch URL'.

index_name.info: The index name where the vectors will be stored in Elasticsearch cluster.

username.info: Elasticsearch username (e.g., 'elastic'). Required for both local and Elastic Cloud setups unless API keys are used.

password.info: Elasticsearch password for the specified user. Required for both local and Elastic Cloud setups unless API keys are used.

search_score_threshold.info: Minimum similarity score threshold for search results.

api_key.info: API Key for Elastic Cloud authentication. If used, 'username' and 'password' are not required.

verify_certs.info: Whether to verify SSL certificates when connecting to Elasticsearch.
